attributes.action: Encourage families with school age children to take summer holidays within the UK
attributes.additional_details:
To boost the domestic economy  and to encourage families to take summer holidays  within the UK,  please  take measures to encourage  UK holiday resorts to  offer price incentives  for families with school age children  to take their holidays  at home within the UK.

Alternatively,  encourage local education authorities  to  spread summer school holidays  into September
